EDI Resources

Here are some resources to help you learn more about equality, diversity and inclusion.

Books

These books are suggested to have a read if you can.

Racism

  • Why I'm No Longer Talking to White People About Race by Reni Eddo-Lodge
  • How to Be an Antiracist by Ibram X. Kendi
  • Me and White Supremacy by Layla F. Saad
  • White Fragility by Robin DiAngelo
  • Between the World and Me by Ta-Nehisi Coates

Feminism

  • We Should All Be Feminists by Chimamanda Ngozi Adichie
  • Bad Feminist by Roxane Gay
  • The Handmaid's Tale by Margaret Atwood

LGBTQIA+

  • The Gender Games by Juno Dawson
  • How to Survive a Plague by David France
  • Red, White & Royal Blue by Casey McQuiston

Films

  • The Color Purple
  • 12 Years a Slave
  • Hidden Figures
  • Selma
  • Get Out
  • Moonlight
  • Just Mercy
  • Black Panther

Magazines & Articles

  • The Guardian - Race Equality
  • The New York Times - Race/Related
  • National Geographic - Race
  • Forbes - Diversity & Inclusion
